page.title: 01General Description.
page.content: Whitchurch is a small country town in Northern Hampshire.It is situated in the valley of the River Test.The town is situated at the crossroads of the road from Basingstoke to Andover and the road from Southampton to the Midlands,although this road is now taken around the town by a by-pass. The population of the town is approximately four thousand people,many of whom do not work in the town but travel to such places as Basingstoke,Southampton and London. There are no large industries in Whitchurch,most of the jobs which are in the town are mainly in small firms,shops and offices.
